;==Diagonal Tile and Adjacencies (R3 Ramps)==
;-----------------------
;----L0 MIS (0x5702)----
;-----------------------
;----Base Network (RHW-2)----
;02 to 02 (B1 R3 o -> Diag)
0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57020200,2,0
0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57020200,1,0
;02 to 03 (B1 R3 o -> Stub)
0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57000300,3,1=0x57B00A80,0,1,0x57020300,3,1
0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57000300,1,0=0x57B00A00,2,0,0x57020300,1,0
;00 to 00 (B1 R3 d -> Orth)
0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57000000,3,0=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57020000,3,0
0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57000000,1,0=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57020000,1,0
;00 to 10 (B1 R3 d -> Stub)
0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57020100,3,1
0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57000100,1,0=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57020100,1,0
;; CURRENTLY DROPPED DUE TO COMPLICATIONS WITH RUL - THIS NEEDS
;; TO BE TESTED AND FIXED
; ; Blends (Ramp <> MRC R3)
; ; MIS yellow line inside
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906100,2,1=0x57926000,2,1,0x57926100,2,1
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906100,0,0=0x57926000,0,0,0x57926100,0,0
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906000,2,1=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57926000,2,1
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906000,0,0=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57926000,0,0
; ; MIS yellow line outside
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906100,0,0=0x57926080,0,0,0x57926180,0,0
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906100,2,1=0x57926080,2,1,0x57926180,2,1
; 0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57906000,0,0=0x57B01A00,3,0,0x57926080,0,0
; 0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57906000,2,1=0x57B01A80,1,1,0x57926080,2,1
;
;----Base Network (RHW-3)----
; B1 d -> E1 d override of bottom section
0x57B12600,3,0,0x57b00900,3,0=0x57B12600,3,0,0x57B12900,3,0
0x57B12680,1,1,0x57b00980,1,1=0x57B12680,1,1,0x57B12980,1,1
0x57B12500,3,0,0x57b00800,3,0=0x57B12500,3,0,0x57B12800,3,0
0x57B12580,1,1,0x57b00880,1,1=0x57B12580,1,1,0x57B12880,1,1
0x57B12800,3,0,0x57b00a00,3,0=0x57B12800,3,0,0x57B12a00,3,0
0x57B12880,1,1,0x57b00a80,1,1=0x57B12880,1,1,0x57B12a80,1,1
;02 to 02 (E1 R3 o -> Diag)
0x57B12A00,2,0,0x57000200,2,0=0x57B12A00,2,0,0x57020200,2,0
0x57B12A80,0,1,0x57000200,1,0=0x57B12A80,0,1,0x57020200,1,0
;02 to 03 (E1 R3 o -> Stub)
0x57B12A80,0,1,0x57000300,3,1=0x57B12A80,0,1,0x57020300,3,1
0x57B12A00,2,0,0x57000300,1,0=0x57B12A00,2,0,0x57020300,1,0
;00 to 00 (E1 R3 d -> Orth)
;PLACEHOLDER
;00 to 10 (E1 R3 d -> Stub)
;PLACEHOLDER
